title: Night of Blurred Faces
outcome: After a wave of coin-driven activism, vanished citizens trigger the peer-to-peer network: public screens and digital billboards display shifting faces blending vanished individuals and Council members. The city is transfixed and unsettled, sparking widespread protest-art, mass investigation, and new hope in the search for the missing, while trust in Council erodes further.

events.description: Suddenly, all city billboards and screens display swirling faces, merging likenesses of vanished citizens and Council leaders. Residents awaken unsettled by these looping images.

Street art, homemade masks, and impromptu performances inspired by the images spread, transforming neighborhoods into protest zones. Council Loyalists fear the vanished are manipulating public perception.

Amateur investigators note clues hidden in the faces: subtle markers referencing locations and past messages from vanished citizens. Large groups organize to follow the digital trail, searching for answers.
Families of the missing, buoyed by public support, hold massive rallies. Calls for Council transparency grow louder. Directorate deploys patrols, while Harmonists urge restraint.

Council studies the 'face codes' as evidence of deliberate vanished coordination. Internal divisions deepen: Directorate proposes new surveillance, Innovators argue for engagement, and Harmonists lose credibility.
